description: [Not offered from 2012 - replaced by CSSE2010 in 2013] Digital logic & digital systems; machine level representation of data; assembly level machine organization; memory system organization & architecture; interfacing & communication; microcontroller and architecture and usage; functional organization; case studies & laboratory experiments.
incompatible: COMP1300 or COMP2300 or COMP2302 or CSSE7035 or ELEC2002
